testcase.name: testParallel

failure.message:
status code was: 422, expected: 201, response time in milliseconds: 395, url: https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/articles, response: {"errors":{"title":["must be unique"]}} classpath:ConduitApp/feature/Articles.feature:18 match failed: CONTAINS_ONLY $ | actual does not contain expected | actual array length is not equal to expected - 10:2 (LIST:LIST) ["Test","YouTube","Zoom","Bondar Academy","Git","Blog","qa career","QA Skills","Value-Focused","GitHub"] ["YouTube","Zoom"]
classpath:ConduitApp/feature/HomePage.feature:27 status code was: 422, expected: 201, response time in milliseconds: 458, url: https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/users, response: {"errors":{"email":["has already been taken"],"username":["has already been taken"]}} classpath:ConduitApp/feature/Signup.feature:22 ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>

testcase.failure:
org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: status code was: 422, expected: 201, response time in milliseconds: 395, url: https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/articles, response: {"errors":{"title":["must be unique"]}} classpath:ConduitApp/feature/Articles.feature:18 match failed: CONTAINS_ONLY $ | actual does not contain expected | actual array length is not equal to expected - 10:2 (LIST:LIST) ["Test","YouTube","Zoom","Bondar Academy","Git","Blog","qa career","QA Skills","Value-Focused","GitHub"] ["YouTube","Zoom"]
